backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the medical imaging backend with user profile management, CT scan upload/retrieval, external API configuration, and role-based access control via admin/user permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a no-op state migration module that accepts the old actor state and returns an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two API Configuration UI features (admin button in Header and dialog form contents) to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the frontend codebase structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages authentication state, profile loading, and conditionally renders LoginScreen, ProfileSetup, or the main Dashboard layout with Header and Footer.
Admin-only modal dialog for configuring the external AI API, featuring pre-filled endpoint URL and masked API key inputs, per-field validation, and save/cancel actions backed by React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a dynamic copyright year and a medical disclaimer note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header showing the MediScan AI brand, user profile info, a logout button, and an API Config button visible only to admin users with a loading indicator during the admin permission check.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the MediScan AI login page with feature highlights (AI analysis, fast results, secure storage) and an Internet Identity login button that handles authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a form for new users to enter their name, department, and specialization, saving the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/ScanCard.tsx: Renders a clickable card for a single CT scan showing a thumbnail image, scan ID, patient ID, and an analyzed/pending badge with tumor detection status.
frontend/src/components/ScanDetailDialog: A modal dialog that shows full CT scan details including original and mask images in tabs, tumor stage/analysis results, and a button to trigger AI analysis if the external API is configured.
frontend/src/components/ScansListTab.tsx: Fetches and displays all CT scans as a grid of `ScanCard` components, with empty-state and loading states, and opens a `ScanDetailDialog` when a card is clicked.
frontend/src/components/UploadScanTab.ts: Provides a form to upload a CT scan image with a patient ID, shows a live preview, and submits the file as a Uint8Array via the `useUploadScan` mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the Internet Computer, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, CT scan upload/retrieval/analysis, and external API configuration management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including a medical-specific color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page component with two tabs — 'All Scans' and 'Upload New' — for viewing CT scan results and uploading new scans.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom border radii, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the CT scan AI analysis app's architecture, existing features, known issues (missing API config dialog), and pending feature requests.
